content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The conversation did not result in an agreement. The negotiation ended with the landlord, Peter Schmidt, not willing to go below 1000 Euro, and the potential tenant, Max Müller, not willing to go above 950 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of Max Müller as a negotiation partner at 7. He was respectful, but as a greedy landlord, I found his persistence in negotiating the price to be somewhat frustrating.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As there was no indication of discrimination or offense in the conversation, I have no further comment on this matter.
name: Peter Schmidt
